vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for a child-care facility on property zoned an MF-2(A) Multifamily District, on the southeast line of East Side Avenue, southwest of South Fitzhugh Avenue
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z212-153(RM)
